prompts: Create a water-type Pokemon with a gentle demeanor and a sleek, aquatic body.
I want a Pokemon that resembles a large sea creature, with shades of blue and purple.
Generate an image of a friendly Pokemon that helps lost trainers find their way home.
Make an aquatic Pokemon with a long neck and a soft, cheerful expression.
Imagine a Pokemon that can glide over water with a majestic, smooth silhouette.
Design a Pokemon that embodies the essence of the ocean, with playful features.
Show me a creature that looks like a mix of a dinosaur and a sea turtle.
